Main
This app needs access to your camera to record and share videos with your friends.
This app needs access to your microphone to record audio for your videos.
This app needs access to your photo library to save and share your videos.
This app needs access to save videos to your photo library.
This app uses video recording features.
This app needs access to your location to tag your posts and connect with nearby friends.
This app needs access to your location to tag your posts and connect with nearby friends.
This app needs access to your contacts to help you find and connect with friends.
This app uses Face ID for secure authentication and login.
This app needs access to your music library to add background music to your videos.
This app uses motion data to enhance video recording features and effects.
This app uses speech recognition to add captions and transcribe your videos.
This app uses Bluetooth to connect with compatible accessories and devices.
This app uses Bluetooth to connect with compatible accessories and devices.
This app needs access to your calendar to schedule and remind you about events.
This app needs access to your reminders to help you stay organized with your social activities.
